titles.title: A bill to prohibit a COVID-19 vaccination requirement for eligibility in nutrition programs.
A bill to prohibit a COVID-19 vaccination requirement for eligibility in nutrition programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the Department of Agriculture and state agencies from making individuals receive a COVID-19 vaccine in order to participate in the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP), the Special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants, and Children (WIC), and school meals programs.
